Node.description: An expanded collection of methods for Y.Node

frag.description: Returns a Document Fragment as a Y.Node

return.description:
A NodeList containing all the immediate children, or the children
that match the argument selector

params.name: Node
params.description:
The selector to be passed to the underlying all
implementation

params.name: The
params.description: HTML Fragment to wrap around the contents of the current node.

wrapInner.description: Wraps the content of this Node with new HTML

return.description:
A child node matching the node argument, if defined, or the first
child

params.name: node
params.description: The node or selector to search for

one.description:
Extends existing Y.Node.one to take no argument and return the immediate
child of the current node.

Node.name: Node

NodeList.description: An expanded collection of methods for Y.NodeList

params.name: filter
params.description:
A CSS selector string to apply to the list,
or a boolean function to apply to each element in the list. The function
will be passed three arguments, a Y.Node instance of the current node, the
current index in the list, and the NodeList instance.

filter.description: Filters the NodeList instance to only the matching nodes

params.name: first
params.description:
The number of items to return or the boolean
function to execute against the list.

first.description:
Returns either the first node in the list, if there is no arugment provided,
the first n-items in the list, if provided a numeric argument, or the first
item in the list which tests 'true' to the provide boolean function

params.name: last
params.description:
The number of items to return or the boolean
function to execute against the list.

last.description:
Returns either the last node in the list, if there is no arugment provided,
the last n-items in the list, if provided a numeric argument, or the last
item in the list which tests 'true' to the provide boolean function

params.name: filter
params.description:
A CSS selector string to apply to the list,
or a boolean function to apply to each element in the list. The function
will be passed three arguments, a Y.Node instance of the current node, the
current index in the list, and the NodeList instance.

reject.description:
This inverse of filter. Applies :not to a selector, or builds a NodeList
consisting of all the nodes for which the argument is false

NodeList.name: NodeList

gallery-node-extras.description: An expanded collection of methods for Y.Node
gallery-node-extras.name: gallery-node-extras

gallery-nodelist-extras.description: An expanded collection of methods for Y.NodeList
gallery-nodelist-extras.name: gallery-nodelist-extras
